nodes.text: The Cularin Militia was a military force with loyalty to the Cularin system. It resisted incursions of the Thaereian military into the system, which earned them the Gold Order of Cularin. Osten Dal'Nay and Broof Yurdel were both leaders of it.
During the Clone Wars, it was renamed the Cularin Armed Forces and became part of the Republic Military. After the conflict ended, it became independent again.
